definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: The regional flag of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region is a red flag with a bauhinia highlighted by five star-tipped stamens.
sentences.chinese: 香港特別行政區的區旗是五星花蕊的紫荊花紅旗。

sentences.english: The bushes in the mouth bird flowers habitat raising An Nian.
sentences.chinese: 那灌木叢裏的知更雀就在叼起的花蕊裏棲養安年。

sentences.english: Results The IR spectrometry of Ophicalcitum was different before and after calcination.
sentences.chinese: 結果炮製前後的花蕊石紅外光譜圖有明顯差異。

sentences.english: Come to realize, the Bana open, bloody flower, the extradition of the Lost souls.
sentences.chinese: 恍然間，彼岸花開，血色花蕊，引渡着迷惘的遊魂。

sentences.english: The middle of the flower seems to some like a long bright yellow corn as the soft stems.
sentences.chinese: 中間的花蕊上似乎長着一些似玉米一樣嫩黃色的軟莖。

sentences.english: Its yellow center with white star-like petals has become an Alpine symbol, present in many folk art handicrafts.
sentences.chinese: 花蕊白星狀花已爾卑斯山象徵，許俗藝品都看。

sentences.english: The regional flag of HKSAR is a red flag with a bauhinia highlighted by five star-tipped stamens.
sentences.chinese: 香港特別行政區的區旗是五星花蕊的紫荊花紅旗。

sentences.english: And what is wonderful is that a new flower contains all the flowers in it.
sentences.chinese: 奇妙的是一朵新花包含了所有的花在她的花蕊之中。

sentences.english: The carpel, or seed pod, serves as your doll's head. The stamens will form a collar.
sentences.chinese: 心皮，種子莢果就做你娃娃的頭，花蕊就當衣領。

definition: (of a plant) to be in bud
style of folk song popular in Gansu, Qinghai and Ningxia/CL:首[shou3]
tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
